title: Grant's Fall Investment Conference announces its first live Webcast
content:
SOURCE Grant's Interest Rate Observer

NEW YORK 

Speakers include:

Chuck Akre 

For more information on Grant's and its twice-annual investment events, please visit our website at www.grantspub.com or contact Eric Whitehead 

To register for the Webcast please visit www.grantspub.com/webinar and use promotion code 0915P to receive an autographed copy of Jim Grant's 

Contact 

To learn more please contact 

Eric I. Whitehead
